LanguageData.WNA_BaseDoor.label: WNA standard door
LanguageData.WNA_BaseDoor.description: Form a door from nothing. This technique is hardly known by outsiders.
LanguageData.WNA_BaseGrid.label: WNA grid
LanguageData.WNA_BaseGrid.description: Form a wall that can be shot over from nothing. This technique is hardly known by outsiders.
LanguageData.WNA_BaseODoor.label: WNA wide door
LanguageData.WNA_BaseODoor.description: Form a door from nothing. This technique is hardly known by outsiders.
LanguageData.WNA_BaseWall.label: WNA wall
LanguageData.WNA_BaseWall.description: Form a wall from nothing. This technique is hardly known by outsiders.
LanguageData.WNA_FortressDoor.label: fortress door
LanguageData.WNA_FortressDoor.description: An advanced concrete gate, used for fortresses. What's special about this gate is that it can restore itself due to how it is built.
LanguageData.WNA_FortressGate.label: fortress gate
LanguageData.WNA_FortressGate.description: An advanced concrete gate, used for fortresses. What's special about this gate is that it can restore itself due to how it is built.
LanguageData.WNA_FortressWall.label: fortress wall
LanguageData.WNA_FortressWall.description: An advanced concrete wall, used for fortresses. What's special about this wall is that it can restore itself due to how it is built.
LanguageData.WNA_StuffDoor.label: WNA matdoor
LanguageData.WNA_StuffDoor.description: Form a door from a piece of actual material. This door blocks light and takes some more work to build.
LanguageData.WNA_StuffGrid.label: WNA matgrid
LanguageData.WNA_StuffGrid.description: Form a wall from a piece of actual material. This wall takes some more work to build.
LanguageData.WNA_StuffODoor.label: WNA wide matdoor
LanguageData.WNA_StuffODoor.description: Form a door from a piece of actual material. This door is wide and blocks light and takes some more work to build.
LanguageData.WNA_StuffWall.label: WNA matwall
LanguageData.WNA_StuffWall.description: Form a wall from a piece of actual material. This wall blocks light and takes some more work to build.
